page.title: 12Tourism: Climate
page.content: The economy of Eastbourne depends to a large extent on the summer tourist trade and there are many hotels and guest houses in the town. Part of the attraction of the area is the open downland to the west of the town and the numerous sporting facilities.London is within easy reach by road or train and Eastbourne has built up a reputation as a family holiday resort. The area around Eastbourne is regarded as a healthy area to live. It gets more than average sunshine and the sea air is bracing. In addition to summer visitors many old people retire to Eastbourne because of the climate. At the weekends and at holiday time one can see many cars parked along the coast road leading to Beachy Head. The tourists like to sit there and relax,enjoying the sunshine and view.
